body_html:
@BrianOn99 I suppose you could modify the method prototype to also take in an optional luminance plane. I think that would be better than having Camera references and duplicate processing code creeping into the actual Activity implementations.

Regarding camera.addCallbackBuffer(bytes) perhaps just have two buffers and return the old one when you get the new one.
body_text:

Regarding camera.addCallbackBuffer(bytes) perhaps just have two buffers and return the old one when you get the new one.
body:
@BrianOn99 I suppose you could modify the method prototype to also take in an optional luminance plane. I think that would be better than having Camera references and duplicate processing code creeping into the actual Activity implementations.

Regarding camera.addCallbackBuffer(bytes) perhaps just have two buffers and return the old one when you get the new one.
